main event: Military personnel at Sawyer AFB observed a bright light that appeared to be a UFO on 15 October 1965.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 9-10 minutes,The observation confirmed the object was sharply outlined and a solid color light, The object's color changed from white to gold-orange as it accelerated rapidly, No radar confirmation of the object was made, The light initially appeared stationary before rapidly ascending into the clouds.
location: Byer K I Sawyer AFB, Michigan, USA
witness description: Captain of security at Sawyer AFB, USAF.
